participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and warm-hearted, Emily is always looking for ways to express herself through her hobbies. She is nurturing and enjoys the company of her pets.
participant_1.background: i've a dogs. i love to bake cookies. knitting is my passion. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home.

participant_2.name: Oliver
participant_2.personality: Analytical and patient, Oliver has a deep appreciation for art and history. He enjoys sharing knowledge and has a calming presence.
participant_2.background: i am a museum tour guide. i'm partly deaf. i love to drink fancy tea. i have a big library at home. i grow roses in my garden.
